snippet: A moment of silence will be observed before Russian Premier League football matches this weekend as a mark of respect for those who lost their lives in a plane crash in southern Russia on Saturday. ...

headline.main: Russian League to Mark Respect for Crash Victims
headline.print_headline: Russian League to Mark Respect for Crash Victims

lead_paragraph: A moment of silence will be observed before Russian Premier League football matches this weekend as a mark of respect for those who lost their lives in a plane crash in southern Russia on Saturday.

snippet: The unpredictable nature of the Premier League this season means it is essential for Manchester City to beat second-placed Tottenham Hotspur on Sunday to keep their title aspirations alive, right back Bacary Sagna said....

headline.main: Unpredictable League Makes Beating Spurs Essential-Sagna
headline.print_headline: Unpredictable League Makes Beating Spurs Essential-Sagna

lead_paragraph: The unpredictable nature of the Premier League this season means it is essential for Manchester City to beat second-placed Tottenham Hotspur on Sunday to keep their title aspirations alive, right back Bacary Sagna said.

snippet: Three successful seasons of the Pro Kabaddi League have convinced its organisers that the tournament has curved its place in India's sporting landscape and time is ripe to go biannual....

headline.main: Indian League Goes Biannual After Early Success
headline.print_headline: Indian League Goes Biannual After Early Success

lead_paragraph: Three successful seasons of the Pro Kabaddi League have convinced its organisers that the tournament has curved its place in India's sporting landscape and time is ripe to go biannual.

snippet: The Western Sydney Wanderers have penned more fairytales than the Brothers Grimm in their short history in Australia's top-flight and another storybook ending beckons them in Sunday's A-League title-decider against Adelaide United....

headline.main: Western Sydney Chase Another A-League Fairytale
headline.print_headline: Western Sydney Chase Another A-League Fairytale

lead_paragraph: The Western Sydney Wanderers have penned more fairytales than the Brothers Grimm in their short history in Australia's top-flight and another storybook ending beckons them in Sunday's A-League title-decider against Adelaide United.

snippet: Pep Guardiola will return to the Nou Camp in the Champions League group stage after his new club Manchester City were drawn against his former Barcelona team on Thursday in one of the toughest of the eight groups....

headline.main: Guardiola Returning to Barca in Champions League
headline.print_headline: Guardiola Returning to Barca in Champions League

lead_paragraph: Pep Guardiola will return to the Nou Camp in the Champions League group stage after his new club Manchester City were drawn against his former Barcelona team on Thursday in one of the toughest of the eight groups.

snippet: Diego Simeone has turned Atletico Madrid from a team teetering on the brink of relegation into European heavyweights....

headline.main: Champions League Trophy Would Complete Simeone Revolution
headline.print_headline: Champions League Trophy Would Complete Simeone Revolution

lead_paragraph: Diego Simeone has turned Atletico Madrid from a team teetering on the brink of relegation into European heavyweights.

snippet: A repeat of the 2014 Champions League final between Real Madrid and Atletico Madrid is still possible after Friday's semi-final draw....

headline.main: All-Madrid Champions League Final Still Possible
headline.print_headline: All-Madrid Champions League Final Still Possible

lead_paragraph: A repeat of the 2014 Champions League final between Real Madrid and Atletico Madrid is still possible after Friday's semi-final draw.

snippet: Liverpool reached the League Cup semi-finals after 17-year-old Ben Woodburn enjoyed a night to remember by becoming the club's youngest ever goalscorer when he wrapped up a 2-0 victory over Leeds United on Tuesday....

headline.main: Record-Breaker Woodburn Helps Liverpool Reach League Cup Semis
headline.print_headline: Record-Breaker Woodburn Helps Liverpool Reach League Cup Semis

lead_paragraph: Liverpool reached the League Cup semi-finals after 17-year-old Ben Woodburn enjoyed a night to remember by becoming the club's youngest ever goalscorer when he wrapped up a 2-0 victory over Leeds United on Tuesday.

snippet: Premier League teams Burnley and Middlesbrough were knocked out of the English Cup by lower-league teams in the second round on Wednesday....

headline.main: Burnley and Middlesbrough Sent Packing in League Cup
headline.print_headline: Burnley and Middlesbrough Sent Packing in League Cup

lead_paragraph: Premier League teams Burnley and Middlesbrough were knocked out of the English Cup by lower-league teams in the second round on Wednesday.

snippet: Real Madrid are the richest football club by revenue for the 11th straight year and La Liga rivals Barcelona have leapfrogged Manchester United into second, according to Deloitte's Football Money League....

headline.main: Real Top Money League Again as Club Revenues Surge
headline.print_headline: Real Top Money League Again as Club Revenues Surge

lead_paragraph: Real Madrid are the richest football club by revenue for the 11th straight year and La Liga rivals Barcelona have leapfrogged Manchester United into second, according to Deloitte's Football Money League.
